Interface GameController.ViewDelegate

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
Enclosing class:
GameController
public static interface GameController.ViewDelegate
The required interface to display the game

    • displayTurn

      Displays whose turn it is.
      Parameters:

    • setColor

      void setColor(int row, int col, TileColor tileColor)
      Places a tile of the specified color at a position.
      Parameters:
      row - the row to play the piece into
      col - the column to play the piece into
      tileColor - the color of the piece

      void listen(MouseListener mouseListener)
      Listens for mouse clicks.

    • getHexDim

      Optional<RowColPair> getHexDim(int y, int x)
      Converts x and y pixel coordinates to a position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      y - the y-coordinate
      x - the x-coordinate
      Returns:
      the corresponding position on the game board
